Text: RE Got a minuteThanks Ill check with them too Tony Sharp Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday August AM To Tony Sharp Subject Re Got a minute Im not sure that we would have anything right now here at Enron North America however their may be opportunities at Crestone Energy Bear Paw Northern Border all still Enron They are in another office at th and Market headed by Brian Bierbach Ill mention it to Mark also Talk to you soon Theresa Tony Sharp swes To tmailnet cc Subject Got a minute PM Do you think there might be a fit for me at Enron I talked to Mark Whitt for a while after you left and he seems like a nice guy but I never asked him about a job What do you think Tony Sharp This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
